MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL58 postcode area of Beaumaris, affecting properties in Penmon, Llanfaes and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.17PM on 31st October 2020
